task.summary: Default task
added some performance tests on writing data to SOS + renamed DiscoveryData class to DDS, DNS to NDS and added MCS
NDS node almost finished
general work aimed at improving the code + started to work on some policies
interim - removed DBConnection interface + added some javadocs
interim - working on the REST interface + SOSURLConnection.
DDS + Storage REST

nds - registration protocol basics working + minor changes to SOSURLConnection
TODO: - check that the NDSFilter works properly - fix various issues with the node registration and the nodes persistence in the DB
rest-nds: find node by guid
rest-nds finished + change /roles to /info
update maven dependencies + RESTGeneralTest using testNG + jetty test framework with jersey
DDS and NDS filters registered + create server state from config file + dummy DDS rest
DDS Rest basic layout
add manifest to DDS + prov --> provenance
general code tweaks
general changes to project + some basic refactoring
using okhttp for dealing with http requests
more development on the network layer + tests for sync requests
SyncRequestTests + log4j config + REST basic test

See commit description:
- CommonTest for sos-core - SQLDB: insert or update query - Base test for RESTNDS
network layer: init requests manager in the local node + sync requests return response on playing request
removed INDEX + added metadata folder
removing grizzly server + doing some work on the sos config
starting to work on the web app to interact with sos
interim : working on getting the server state class in a proper condition
moved ServerState to sos-app, a new module that will be used as the main entry point for the entire sos app.
using common-cli for parsing cli options
deleting sos-cli
reading config path via commons-cli
Finally fixed issue with the NodeManagerTests - had to make sure that the db was clean
removed Lucene leftovers in pom files + working on the metadata aspect of sos-core + handling input within sos-app
interim - remove index exception
basic get and set head. Available to client only
minor changes

Check comments below:
- added webdav instance - added SOS-FS module for webdav - started to work on webui graph
Visualised the SOS for the first time! It is not great, and the code must be improved, but it is awesome! :)
show data on double clicking atoms
showing manifest json on double click
worked on replication policy and configs
managing configuration using typesafe/config
interim - configuration and policies
basic data replication working
